content.query:
CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SynapseSqlCredential
	WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE',
	SECRET = 'ePmku2EGnbB0HTYPQFesiqyTKRa6lBWpzw3B89/DGvWk10WVR0kSKZsohvfgFrDtuLlpFoZi44WU+UMqp4fBLQ==';  
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SynapseSqlDataSource
WITH  (
        LOCATION ='https://bluebadgehdisa.blob.core.windows.net/bluebadgehdisc/example/data/',
    	CREDENTIAL = SynapseSqlCredential
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT QuotedCsvWithHeaderFormat
WITH (  
     FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
     FORMAT_OPTIONS ( FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2   )
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE MoviesDB(
    id int,
    title VARCHAR(100),
    genre VARCHAR(100),
    year SMALLINT,
    rating SMALLINT,
    rottentomato SMALLINT
)
WITH ( LOCATION= 'MoviesDBFresh.csv', DATA_SOURCE = SynapseSqlDataSource, FILE_FORMAT = QuotedCsvWithHeaderFormat);

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM MoviesDB

DROP EXTERNAL TABLE MoviesDB
DROP EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SynapseSqlDataSource
DROP DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SynapseSqlCredential
DROP EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT QuotedCsvWithHeaderFormat
